SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class GameCliView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GameCliView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameView
public class GameCliView extends Object implements GameView
This class handles the CLI view of the game. It contains all the methods used to show the game state to the user by the command line and to get input from the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameCliView

      public GameCliView()
      Constructor of the class. It asks the user for the server IP and the protocol to use (RMI or TCP).

  • Method Details

    • loginProcedure

      public void loginProcedure()
      Starts the login procedure, it asks the user for a username and sends it to the server. It also starts the ping thread for check the connection.
      Specified by:
      loginProcedure in interface GameView

    • startView

      public void startView()
      Shows the start game.
      Specified by:
      startView in interface GameView

    • readUsername

      public String readUsername()
      Reads the username from the command line and prompts the user to confirm it.

      If the user confirms the input, the method prints a welcome message.

      If the user does not confirm the input, the method prints a prompt to insert the username again and calls itself recursively.

      Returns:
      the username inserted by the user

    • readNumber

      public int readNumber()
      Reads a number from the command line. Handles errors by prompting the user to insert the number again.
      Returns:
      the number inserted by the user

    • showLogin

      public String showLogin()
      Shows the loginPrompt for the user.

    • promptFirstGame

      public boolean promptFirstGame()
      Shows the first game question for the user.

      Shows the prompt for the number of players choice.
      Returns:

      public void showPersonalGoal(int card) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Shows the PersonalGoal card.
      Parameters:
      card - the number of the card to show
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the file is not in the correct format

    • showCommonGoal

      public void showCommonGoal(String card, int occurrences, int size, boolean horizontal)
      Shows the PublicGoal cards.
      Parameters:
      card - the number of the card to show
      occurrences - the number of occurrences of the card
      size - is the number of items in each occurrence of the common goal
      horizontal - true if the cards are to be printed horizontally, false if vertically
